main event: An Airman observed a bright light in the southern sky at Otis AFB, Massachusetts on 6 July 1956.
interesting points: The light was described as extremely bright and changing colors from white to red,The light exhibited rapid and erratic movements, making sharp turns,The sighting lasted approximately 35 seconds,The event was reported by Airman 1st Class Charles O. Pluff,The report mentions a separate sighting on 17 July 1956 of a circular light with erratic movements.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
